pages.text: Fortify your allies. The Ritual of the Steadfast Heart grants increasingly powerful Absorption effects to all nearby players, providing extra health that regenerates over time.

pages.title: Costs & Details
pages.text: $(bold)Activation:$() 20000 LP$(br)$(bold)Refresh:$() 100 LP per player$(br)$(bold)Refresh Time:$() 600 ticks (30 seconds)$(br2)$(bold)Effect Range:$() 32x32x32 blocks (configurable)$(br2)Each time the ritual runs, it extends and strengthens the absorption effect on nearby players.
